##### I am an Assistant Professor in the [Peter O'Donnell Jr. School of Public Health](https://osph.utsouthwestern.edu/){target="_blank"} at [The University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center](https://www.utsouthwestern.edu){target="_blank"}.
